original_text: I told them to take care of the valuable things that we had received for the temple of our God. These were silver and gold things and other special things that the king, his helpers and his officers had given to us. Israelite people who were living in Babylonia had also given us valuable things for the temple. I weighed all these things.
korean_text: 그들에게 왕과 모사들과 방백들과 또 그 곳에 있는 이스라엘 무리가 우리 하나님의 성전을 위하여 드린 은과 금과 그릇들을 달아서 주었으니

sentences.original_text: I told them to take care of the valuable things
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들에게 귀중한 물건들을 잘 관리하라고 말했습니다

sentences.original_text: that we had received for the temple of our God
sentences.korean_translation: 우리 하나님의 성전을 위해 받은 것들을

sentences.original_text: These were silver and gold things
that the king, his helpers and his officers had given to us
sentences.korean_translation: 왕과 그의 도우미들과 관리들이 우리에게 준 것들을

sentences.original_text: Israelite people who were living in Babylonia
had also given us valuable things for the temple
sentences.korean_translation: 성전을 위해 우리에게 귀중한 것들을 주었습니다
나는 이 모든 것들을 무게를 달았습니다
